sn33.4:4.2: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha:
sn33.4:4.3: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? …”
sn33.4:4.6: “Vaccha, it is because of not knowing choices, their origin, their cessation, and the practice that leads to their cessation …”
